content:
I've been having lots of trouble with the IG Publisher tool today. The logging seems to get into an endless loop of: "Terminology server: Check for supported code systems for urn:ietf:bcp:47".

I think I've seen this before when the terminology server is down. Is anyone else experiencing this?
I've just tried browsing to http://fhir3.healthintersections.com.au/tx, and it seems OK, but the IG Publisher still doesn't want to get past those terminology checks.

I've just tried again and the ig publisher seems to be happier now. The build's not done, but it's progressing much further than it did before. I noticed that Grahame indicated he just fixed the FHIR3 test server, so I'm guessing that whatever he did for that also fixed this.
you should be using the tx server http://tx.fhir.org/r3 now
I'm in the process of catching up on here now, but in future, raise issues like this on the committers stream - I am much more focused on staying up to date there
